variants.Description in input context: Mutants in the N-terminus, C-terminus, and kinase domain of PINK1

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Oxidative stress-induced apoptosis and mitochondrial membrane potential (ΔCm) assay

Material used.Material Name: Stable human dopaminergic neuronal cell lines
Material used.Description: Stable human dopaminergic neuronal cell lines coexpressing normal and mutant PINK1 to simulate 'heterozygous' and 'homozygous' states

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Increased apoptosis rate and decreased ΔCm
Readout description.Result Description: Cell lines expressing kinase and C-terminus mutants exhibited greater apoptosis rates and decreased ΔCm, with homozygous mutants showing more severe effects compared to heterozygous and wild-type cell lines

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 cell lines as controls

Basic negative control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 cell lines as controls
